text: @Alyssafarah @realDonaldTrump Therefore, the @WhiteHouse has chosen to terminate Peter Navarro for his failure to use normal clearance protocol, subsequently reflecting poorly on the @POTUS position regarding the lethal COVID19 pandemic... 🤔
